name: A cold winter (Vlad1111)
description:
The winter is harsh this year. All you are thinking about is your family's survival.

But the forest is treacherous and resources few and far in between.

Yet you are determined. You will go and do anything for your family. You will succeed.

But will you return home with a smile on your face or a changed man, a shadow of what you were?

And will it matter as long as your family is still alive?
